Attention binge-watchers! ðŸ“£ Struggling to keep track of your screen time? Here's a game-changer for you.

If you often lose track of your hours spent watching movies and series each month, this Chrome extension is a must-have. It effortlessly tracks your watch time across all streaming platforms (YouTube, Netflix, etc.) and runs a timer whenever a video is playing. You can set a monthly watch time limit, and once you reach it, the extension will alert you and block further video playback until you adjust the limit. It's the perfect tool for managing your screen time and staying in control!
